decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: TPD/PP/L01; E01; E02; P01; P02; P03; P04; P05; P06; Helios Flanged Circular Attenuation; Helio Gigabox Fan; katercarb-Carbon Unit; Phone Star Installation; Phonewell Boards.

Condition : 3 - Due to the potential impact of the surrounding locality on the residential development, a scheme for protecting residents from noise shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the development commencing. The scheme shall be designed to achieve noise levels, (expressed as the equivalent continuous sound level) LAeq (15 minutes), from any new plant / machinery shall not exceed LA90-5dB at the boundary with the closest residential or noise sensitive property. Suitable flexible coupling shall be used to minimise vibration. 

Reason: In the interests of respecting neighbouring amenity. To comply with Policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies DM D2 and DM EP2 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 4 - Details of the measures to control odour from all mechanical systems
serving the food premises shall be submitted to and approved in writing
by the Local Planning Authority and implemented. The measures are
subject to approval by the Local Planning Authority and the system shall
be designed so neighbouring premises are not affected by odour.

Reason: In the interests of respecting neighbouring amenity. To comply
with Policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies DM D2 and DM
EP2 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 5 - No motorised vehicles shall be used as part of any food take-away
service.

Reason: In the interests of respecting neighbouring amenity. To comply
with Policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies DM D2 and DM
EP2 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 6 - Prior to first use of the extractor system hereby permitted, details of
opening hours for each day of the week shall be submitted to and
approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Reason: In the interests of respecting neighbouring amenity. To comply
with Policy D14 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies DM D2 and DM
EP2 of the Merton Sites and Policies Plan 2014.

Condition : 7 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
